title: Top Places for Dubai Summer Road Trips
description: Put a road trip on your bucket list as a way to escape the summer heat. Make your trip unforgettable by taking advantage of the fast automobiles available for rental in Dubai. Discover some of Dubai's most energizing views via driving. Click to read!

title: The Best Places to Drive and Explore Dubai
description: Rent-a-car companies offer good prices for car rentals in Dubai. As a result, both residents and visitors increasingly enjoy road journeys. This blog lists some of the top places you can drive to from Dubai. Click to read!

title: Dubai 2022 Traffic Regulations and Fines You Must Know
description: Although they are a common form of transportation, cars can be dangerous. Traffic regulations should be adhered to in order to prevent this; breaking them will result in penalties. Learn what are the rules and regulation around driving in Dubai.

title: Things to Consider When Choosing Between A Sedan and SUV Car
description: Renting any car requires a decent amount of research work. Often people get confused over whether they should rent an SUV or a sedan. Yet here we will tell you 3 things that should be kept in mind when choosing between SUV and a sedan car.

title: Locking Children Unattended in Cars May Lead to Suffocation
description: Be sure to always check the backseat before exiting the car to make sure you do not leave your child behind. Following certain safety measures, like discouraging your child from playing in the car, making sure the key to the car is kept away from the child, among many others, can be very helpful.

title: Summer is Coming – How to Prevent My Car from Catching Fire
description: There are several reasons for a car to catch fire. These include poor maintenance, an accident, and more. In this guide, we have discussed the various things that you can do to prevent your car from catching fire. In the event of a fire, there are a few tips that you can follow.

title: Fuel Prices Increasing – Why Switching to Electric or Hybrid Cars is Better
description: If you are reluctant to switch to electric or hybrid cars, then this guide is for you. Today, many are switching to electric and hybrid cars, not only because of the rise in fuel prices but also because these cars have plenty of benefits to offer.

title: Guide to Understand Salik Account 2022 and Tips to Avoid Fines
description: When driving on the roads of a country, you have an obligation to pay road tax, especially when you are a commercial vehicle. Find out how you can open a Salik account for a rental car and ways to prevent penalties associated with it in Dubai?

title: Know the COVID Rules for Abu Dhabi or Dubai
description: With things going back to normal after a long hiatus of COVID-19, it is that time of the year to visit Dubai & Abu Dhabi, especially since the Expo is round the corner. But remember to check through these COVID safety rules before entering the country.

title: Signs That Your Car's Battery Is Likely to Collapse
description: A car’s battery is the most turbulent part and comes with an expiration date. So identifying the time comes with the territory of owning the car. This blog will list signs to look for and know when to change your car’s dead battery.
